column4: Ubuntu 11 - how can I tell dash (the finder thing) to exclude certain files/directories from the file finder? There's a bunch of files I'd prefer everyone not see image previews on whenever you type jpg.....
i think the webupd8 blog site or omgubuntu blog site. had a posting on how to 'hide' things like that.
i have that bookamrked on my delicious.com/dr_willis site.
